messages.text:
Hi Mudge :slightly_smiling_face: :raising_hand::skin-tone-4: 
 Thank you so much for your message last week. Meant a lot to me for you to reach out. Unfortunately, I was let go last Monday. I will no longer be working at 8i. While it undoubtedly makes me sad, I am so happy and honored to have worked with you during my time at 8i. I think we made a great team together, and we both went above and beyond in all of our tasks. You were always so helpful and patient with all of us, and I will be forever grateful to you. I knew we could always count on you for anything, so I took the liberty of letting people know in LA any chance I got because I wanted your value and intelligence to be widely known across all teams in LA. Thank you for making my job so easy. It's been an awesome ride. 
 I would love to stay in touch as well! Here is my contact info: 
 alennihernandezg@gmail.com (760) 222-6249 
 
 Thank you for everything Mudge :heart:

Good Morning Alenni :simple_smile: 
 I know today is the big day for you guys, and I have no idea how USA redundancy laws work, but last time it was all over so fast I thought I better get in early. 
 Even if you are staying (:fingerscrossed:), I found out I will not be, this will most likely be my last week at 8i. 
 I just wanted to let you know that you were the most amazing person to work with. So good with all communication and being responsible for getting things done. If I ever needed to deal with anything in the US office, I knew you would be there willing to help. 
 Itâ€™s amazing now to look at how we did all of this purely using slack, for an entire year before we got to meet properly. 
 Also I really enjoyed when you visited the Wellington office, Those were some of the best nights out I have had. 
 
 Anyway I would love to keep in touch. Let me know if you ever decide to come back to visit NZ. 
 mike.mudge@gmail.com, +64273896828

A hat-trick or hat trick in sports is the achievement of a positive feat three times in a game, or another achievement based on the number three in some sports.
